trans-unit.source: Provides support for programmatically invoking XML Web services discovery.
trans-unit.target: Fornece suporte para invocar programaticamente a deteção de serviços Web de XML.

trans-unit.source: XML Web service discovery is the process of locating, or discovering, one or more related documents that describe available XML Web services.
trans-unit.target: Deteção do serviço XML Web é o processo de localizar, ou deteção, um ou mais relacionados com os documentos que descrevem os XML Web services disponíveis.

trans-unit.source: It is through XML Web services discovery that XML Web service clients learn about the available XML Web services at a given URL and how to use them.
trans-unit.target: É através da deteção de serviços Web de XML que os clientes de serviço XML Web Saiba mais sobre os serviços Web de XML disponíveis um URL fornecido e como utilizá-los.

trans-unit.source: XML Web services discovery works from the premise that you have already obtained the URL to a discovery document, possibly through a directory service, such as http://uddi.microsoft.com, however, you do not have the details about the XML Web services offered.
trans-unit.target: Oferecido XML Web services deteção funciona do local que têm de já obteve o URL para um documento de identificação, possivelmente através de um serviço de diretório, como http://uddi.microsoft.com, no entanto, não tem os detalhes sobre os serviços Web de XML.

trans-unit.source: Through XML Web services discovery, you can discover the details about the XML Web services listed in a <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument> at a specific URL.
trans-unit.target: Através da deteção de serviços Web de XML, pode detetar os detalhes sobre os serviços Web de XML listados num <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument>um URL específico.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument>

trans-unit.source: An XML Web service client starts XML Web services discovery by supplying a URL to either the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A> or <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Um cliente do serviço XML Web inicia a deteção de serviços Web de XML, fornecendo um URL para um o <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A>ou <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A>

trans-unit.source: Typically, this URL refers to a discovery document, which in turn refers to documents that describe one or more XML Web services, which are added to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, este URL se refere a um documento de deteção, que por sua vez refere-se aos documentos que descrevem um ou mais serviços Web de XML, que são adicionados à <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A>

trans-unit.source: At that point, only that document is downloaded and verified to point to valid information about XML Web services.
trans-unit.target: Nessa altura, apenas esse documento é transferido e verificado para apontar para válido informações sobre os XML Web services.

trans-unit.source: However, the references contained in that document are not verified at this stage.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, as referências contidas nesse documento não são verificadas nesta fase.

trans-unit.source: Instead they are added to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, são adicionadas para o <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A>

trans-unit.source: To verify that the references are valid, invoke the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> or <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> methods, which add valid referenced documents to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para verificar que as referências são válidas, invoque o <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>ou <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A>métodos, que adicionar documentos referenciados válidos para o <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>

trans-unit.source: Last, if a client wants to save the discovery results to disk, invoke the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.WriteAll%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Último, se um cliente que pretende guardar os resultados de deteção para o disco, invoque o <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.WriteAll%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.WriteAll%2A>

trans-unit.source: If programmatic access to XML Web services discovery is not needed, the [!INCLUDE[winsdklong](~/add/includes/winsdklong-md.md)] ships the Web Services Discovery tool (Disco.exe) for discovering XML Web services within a command prompt.
trans-unit.target: Se não for necessário acesso programático para deteção de serviços Web de XML, o [!INCLUDE[winsdklong](~/add/includes/winsdklong-md.md)] é fornecido a ferramenta de deteção de serviços Web (Disco.exe) para detetar os XML Web services dentro de uma linha de comandos.

trans-unit.source: For more details, see [Web Services Discovery Tool (Disco.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/acd88078-c581-42bc-94ca-6633e2851979).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais detalhes, consulte [ferramenta de deteção do Web Services (Disco.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/acd88078-c581-42bc-94ca-6633e2851979).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets information in addition to references found in the discovery document.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as informações para além das referências encontrado no documento de identificação.

trans-unit.source: The AdditionalInformation property primarily contains SOAP bindings, represented by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.SoapBinding> class, defined in the discovery document.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade AdditionalInformation principalmente contém vínculos de SOAP, representados pelo <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.SoapBinding>classe, definida no documento de identificação.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.SoapBinding>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IList> containing additional information found in the discovery document.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.IList>que contém informações adicionais encontrado no documento de deteção.</xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: Discovers the supplied URL to determine if it is a discovery document.
trans-unit.target: Detecta que o URL fornecido para determinar se é um documento de identificação.

trans-unit.source: The Discover method expects that the supplied URL is a discovery document.
trans-unit.target: O método Discover espera que o URL fornecido é um documento de identificação.

trans-unit.source: If the URL refers to a service description or an XML schema an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se o URL se refere a uma descrição de serviço ou um esquema XML é emitida uma exceção.

trans-unit.source: To discover an XML schema or a service description invoke the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para detetar um esquema XML ou uma descrição do serviço de invocar o <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the supplied URL points to a valid discovery document, the discovery document at the supplied URL is added to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Se o URL fornecido aponta para um documento de identificação válido, o documento de identificação no URL fornecido é adicionado ao <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A>e <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A>coleção.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A>

trans-unit.source: Additionally, references within the discovery document are added to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> collection, but not verified to point to valid discovery documents.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, as referências no documento de identificação são adicionadas para o <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A>coleção, mas não é verificado para apontar para documentos de Deteção válido.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A>

trans-unit.source: To verify the references, point to valid discovery documents to invoke the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> or <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Para verificar as referências, aponte para documentos de Deteção válido para invocar a <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>ou <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>

trans-unit.source: The URL where XML Web services discovery begins.
trans-unit.target: O URL em que começa a deteção de serviços Web de XML.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument"></xref> containing the results of XML Web services discovery at the supplied URL.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument"> </xref> que contém os resultados da deteção de serviços Web de XML no URL fornecido.

trans-unit.source: Accessing the supplied URL returned an HTTP status code other than <xref:System.Net.HttpStatusCode>.
trans-unit.target: O URL fornecido a aceder devolveu um código de estado HTTP que não sejam <xref:System.Net.HttpStatusCode>.</xref:System.Net.HttpStatusCode>

trans-unit.source: The url parameteris a valid URL, but does not point to a valid discovery document.
trans-unit.target: O url parameteris um URL válido, mas não aponta para um documento de identificação válido.

trans-unit.source: Discovers the supplied URL to determine if it is a discovery document, service description or an XML Schema Definition (XSD) schema.
trans-unit.target: Detecta que o URL fornecido para determinar se é um documento de identificação, a descrição do serviço ou um esquema de definição de esquema XML (XSD).

trans-unit.source: The DiscoverAny method discovers whether the supplied URL is a discovery document, service description or XSD schema.
trans-unit.target: O método DiscoverAny Deteta se o URL fornecido é um documento de deteção, a descrição do serviço ou o esquema XSD.

trans-unit.source: If it is known that the URL only refers to a discovery document, the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A> method might be invoked.
trans-unit.target: Se sabe-se que o URL apenas se refere a um documento de deteção, o <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A>método pode ser invocado.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the supplied URL points to a valid discovery document, XSD schema, or service description, the discovery document at the supplied URL is added to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> collections.
trans-unit.target: Se o URL fornecido aponta para um documento de Deteção válido, o esquema XSD ou a descrição do serviço, o documento de identificação no URL fornecido é adicionado ao <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A>e <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A>coleções.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the supplied URL refers to an XSD schema or Service Description a <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument> is created in memory and added to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> collections.
trans-unit.target: Quando o URL fornecido refere-se a um esquema XSD ou a descrição do serviço um <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument>é criado na memória e adicionado à <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A>e <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A>coleções.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument>

trans-unit.source: Additionally, references within the discovery document are added to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> collection, but not verified to point to valid discovery documents.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, as referências no documento de identificação são adicionadas para o <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A>coleção, mas não é verificado para apontar para documentos de Deteção válido.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A>

trans-unit.source: To verify that references point to valid discovery documents, invoke the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> or <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Para verificar que as referências apontam para documentos de Deteção válido, invoque o <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>ou <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>

trans-unit.source: The URL where XML Web services discovery begins.
trans-unit.target: O URL em que começa a deteção de serviços Web de XML.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument"></xref> containing the results of XML Web services discovery at the supplied URL.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument"> </xref> que contém os resultados da deteção de serviços Web de XML no URL fornecido.

trans-unit.source: If the url parameter refers to a service description or an XSD Schema, a is created in memory for it.
trans-unit.target: Se o url parâmetro refere-se para uma descrição de serviço ou um esquema XSD, um é criado na memória para o mesmo.

trans-unit.source: Accessing the supplied URL returned an HTTP status code other than <xref:System.Net.HttpStatusCode>.
trans-unit.target: O URL fornecido a aceder devolveu um código de estado HTTP que não sejam <xref:System.Net.HttpStatusCode>.</xref:System.Net.HttpStatusCode>

trans-unit.source: The url parameteris a valid URL, but does not point to a valid discovery document, service description, or XSD schema.
trans-unit.target: O url parameteris um URL válido, mas não aponta para um documento de Deteção válido, a descrição do serviço ou o esquema XSD.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of discovery documents.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de documentos de deteção.

trans-unit.source: The Documents collection is populated during invocations to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de documentos é preenchida durante invocações para o <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>e <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A>

trans-unit.source: During invocations to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A> methods, if the supplied URL is a valid discovery document, that document is added to the Documents collection.
trans-unit.target: Durante a invocações para o <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A>e <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A>métodos, se o URL fornecido é um documento de identificação válido, esse documento é adicionado à coleção de documentos.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A>

trans-unit.source: During invocations to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> methods, valid discovery document references in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> collection are added to the Documents collection.
trans-unit.target: Durante a invocações para o <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>e <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A>métodos, referências do documento de Deteção válido do <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A>coleção são adicionados à coleção de documentos.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientDocumentCollection"></xref> representing the collection of discovery documents found.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientDocumentCollection"> </xref> que representa a coleção de documentos de deteção foi encontrado.

trans-unit.source: Downloads the discovery document at the supplied URL into a <xref:System.IO.Stream> object.
trans-unit.target: Transfere o documento de identificação no URL fornecido para uma <xref:System.IO.Stream>objeto.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The URL of the discovery document to download.
trans-unit.target: O URL do documento de identificação para transferir.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.Stream> containing the document at the supplied URL.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.IO.Stream>que contém o documento no URL fornecido.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The download from the supplied URL returned an HTTP status code other than <xref:System.Net.HttpStatusCode>.
trans-unit.target: A transferência a partir do URL fornecido devolveu um código de estado HTTP que não sejam <xref:System.Net.HttpStatusCode>.</xref:System.Net.HttpStatusCode>

trans-unit.source: Downloads the discovery document at the supplied URL into a object, setting the contentType parameter to the MIME encoding of the discovery document.
trans-unit.target: Transfere o documento de identificação no URL fornecido para uma objeto, definir o contentType parâmetro para a codificação de MIME de documento de identificação.

trans-unit.source: The URL of the discovery document to download.
trans-unit.target: O URL do documento de identificação para transferir.

trans-unit.source: The MIME encoding of the downloaded discovery document.
trans-unit.target: A MIME codificação do documento de identificação transferido.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.Stream> containing the document at the supplied URL.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.IO.Stream>que contém o documento no URL fornecido.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The download from the supplied URL returned an HTTP status code other than <xref:System.Net.HttpStatusCode>.
trans-unit.target: A transferência a partir do URL fornecido devolveu um código de estado HTTP que não sejam <xref:System.Net.HttpStatusCode>.</xref:System.Net.HttpStatusCode>

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of exceptions that occurred during invocation of method from this class.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de exceções que ocorreu durante a invocação do método desta classe.

trans-unit.source: The Errors collection is populated with exceptions that occurred during invocations to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de erros é preenchida com as exceções que ocorreram durante invocações para o <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryExceptionDictionary> is cleared on invocation of these methods.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryExceptionDictionary>está desmarcada na invocação de um destes métodos.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryExceptionDictionary>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryExceptionDictionary"></xref> of exceptions.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryExceptionDictionary"> </xref> de exceções.

trans-unit.source: Instructs the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol"></xref> object to load any external references.
trans-unit.target: Indica o <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol"> </xref> objeto para carregar referências externas.

trans-unit.source: Reads in a file containing a map of saved discovery documents populating the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents*> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References*> properties, with discovery documents, XML Schema Definition (XSD) schemas, and service descriptions referenced in the file.
trans-unit.target: Lê um ficheiro que contém um mapa de documentos de deteção guardado preencher o <> </> *> e <> </> *> propriedades, com os documentos de deteção, esquemas de definição de esquema XML (XSD) e as descrições de serviço referenciadas no ficheiro.

trans-unit.source: A file containing a map of saved discovery documents can be created by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.WriteAll%2A> method or Disco.exe.
trans-unit.target: É possível criar um ficheiro que contenha um mapa de documentos de deteção guardado pelo <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.WriteAll%2A>método ou Disco.exe.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.WriteAll%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `topLevelFilename` parameter must include the fully qualified path if the file does not exist in the current directory.
trans-unit.target: O `topLevelFilename` parâmetro tem de incluir o caminho completamente qualificado se o ficheiro não existir no diretório atual.

trans-unit.source: Name of file to read in, containing the map of saved discovery documents.
trans-unit.target: Nome do ficheiro lida, que contém o mapa de documentos de deteção guardado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientResultCollection"></xref> containing the results found in the file with the map of saved discovery documents.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientResultCollection"> </xref> que contém os resultados no ficheiro com o mapa de documentos de deteção guardado.

trans-unit.source: The file format is a <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoveryClientResultsFile> class serialized into XML; however, one would typically create the file using only the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.WriteAll*> method or Disco.exe.
trans-unit.target: O formato de ficheiro é um <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoveryClientResultsFile>classe serializado no XML; no entanto, um normalmente criaria o ficheiro utilizando apenas a <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.WriteAll*>método ou Disco.exe.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.WriteAll*> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoveryClientResultsFile>

trans-unit.source: A collection of references founds in resolved discovery documents.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de referências founds em documentos de deteção resolvido.

trans-unit.source: The References collection is populated during invocations to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de referências está preenchida durante invocações para o <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>e <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A>

trans-unit.source: During invocations to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A> methods, if the supplied URL is a valid discovery document, that document is added to the References collection together with references found in the discovery document.
trans-unit.target: Durante a invocações para o <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A>e <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A>métodos, se o URL fornecido é um documento de identificação válido, esse documento é adicionado à coleção de referências juntamente com as referências encontrado no documento de deteção.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A>

trans-unit.source: References added during invocations to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A> methods are not necessarily valid discovery documents.
trans-unit.target: Referências adicionadas durante invocações para o <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A>e <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A>métodos não estão os documentos de deteção necessariamente válido.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A>

trans-unit.source: During invocations to <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> references within the References collection are verified as being valid discovery documents.
trans-unit.target: Durante a invocações para <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>e <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A>referências dentro da coleção de referências são validadas como documentos de Deteção válido.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>

trans-unit.source: If they are valid and contain references, they are also added to the References collection.
trans-unit.target: Se forem válidos e contém referências, também são adicionados à coleção de referências.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientReferenceCollection"></xref> of references discovered.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientReferenceCollection"> </xref> de referências detetadas.

trans-unit.source: Resolves all references to discovery documents, XML Schema Definition (XSD) schemas, and service descriptions in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References*> property, as well as references found in referenced discovery documents.
trans-unit.target: Resolve todas as referências a documentos de deteção, esquemas de definição de esquema XML (XSD) e as descrições de serviço no <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References*>propriedade, bem como as referências encontradas em documentos de deteção referenciado.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References*>

trans-unit.source: ResolveAll resolves all valid references it finds and places them in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: ResolveAll resolve válidas todas as referências localiza e coloca-os no <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A>

trans-unit.source: Both ResolveAll and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> download and verify XSD schemas and service descriptions in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Ambos os ResolveAll e <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A>Transferir e certifique-se de esquemas XSD e descrições do serviço de <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, the two methods differ in how they handle discovery documents.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, os dois métodos diferem em como processam estes documentos de deteção.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> resolves all references in discovery documents within the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> property; if a discovery document contains references to other discovery documents, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> resolves just those discovery documents.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A>resolve todas as referências em documentos de deteção dentro de <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A>propriedade; se um documento de identificação contém referências a outros documentos de deteção, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A>resolve apenas esses documentos de deteção.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A></xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A>

trans-unit.source: Discovery documents found in those discovery documents nested one level deep are not resolved by <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A>; whereas ResolveAll resolves them all.
trans-unit.target: Foi encontrados nesses documentos de deteção de documentos de deteção aninhado um nível avançadas não são resolvidas através da <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A>; enquanto ResolveAll resolve todos eles.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A>

trans-unit.source: ResolveAll continues to resolve references in nested discovery documents until there are no more references.
trans-unit.target: ResolveAll continua a resolver referências em documentos de deteção aninhadas até não existirem sem referências mais.

trans-unit.source: Errors occurring during the verification process done by ResolveAll are not thrown at the time of occurrence, but rather collected and added to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Errors%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Erros ocorrer durante o processo de verificação efetuado pelo ResolveAll não são emitidos no momento da ocorrência, mas em vez disso recolhidos e adicionados ao <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Errors%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Errors%2A>

trans-unit.source: Resolves all references to discovery documents, XML Schema Definition (XSD) schemas and service descriptions in <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References*>, as well as references found in those discovery documents.
trans-unit.target: Resolve todas as referências a documentos de deteção, esquemas de definição de esquema XML (XSD) e as descrições de serviço no <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References*>, bem como as referências encontradas nesses documentos de deteção.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References*>

trans-unit.source: ResolveOneLevel resolves all valid references it finds and places them in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: ResolveOneLevel resolve válidas todas as referências localiza e coloca-os no <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A>

trans-unit.source: Both <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> and ResolveOneLevel download and verify XSD schemas and service descriptions in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Ambos <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>e ResolveOneLevel transferir e certifique-se de esquemas XSD e descrições do serviço de <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, the two methods differ in how they handle discovery documents.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, os dois métodos diferem em como processam estes documentos de deteção.

trans-unit.source: ResolveOneLevel resolves all references in discovery documents within the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: ResolveOneLevel resolve todas as referências em documentos de deteção dentro de <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a discovery document contains references to other discovery documents, ResolveOneLevel resolves just those discovery documents.
trans-unit.target: Se um documento de identificação contém referências a outros documentos de deteção, ResolveOneLevel resolve apenas esses documentos de deteção.

trans-unit.source: Discovery documents found in those discovery documents nested one level deep are not resolved by ResolveOneLevel; whereas <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> resolve them all.
trans-unit.target: Foi encontrados nesses documentos de deteção de documentos de deteção aninhado um nível avançadas não estão resolvidos por ResolveOneLevel; enquanto <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>resolver todos eles.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> continues to resolve references in nested discovery documents until there are no more references.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>continua a resolver referências em documentos de deteção aninhadas até não existirem sem referências mais.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>

trans-unit.source: Errors occurring during the verification process done by ResolveOneLevel are not thrown at the time of occurrence, but rather collected and added to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Errors%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Erros ocorrer durante o processo de verificação efetuado pelo ResolveOneLevel não são emitidos no momento da ocorrência, mas em vez disso recolhidos e adicionados ao <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Errors%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Errors%2A>

trans-unit.source: Writes all discovery documents, XML Schema Definition (XSD) schemas, and Service Descriptions in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents*> property to the supplied directory and creates a file in that directory.
trans-unit.target: Escreve todos os documentos de deteção, esquemas de definição de esquema XML (XSD) e as descrições de serviço no <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents*>propriedade para o diretório fornecida e cria um ficheiro no diretório.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents*>

trans-unit.source: The file created with the name of the `topLevelFilename` parameter in the directory specified by the directory parameter contains a map of saved discovery documents, XML Schema Definition (XSD) schemas and service descriptions.
trans-unit.target: O ficheiro criado com o nome de `topLevelFilename` parâmetro no diretório especificado pelo parâmetro diretório contém um mapa de documentos de deteção guardado, esquemas de definição de esquema XML (XSD) e as descrições de serviço.

trans-unit.source: This file can be read in using the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ReadAll%2A> method to populate the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Este ficheiro pode ser lida utilizando o <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ReadAll%2A>método para preencher o <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A>e <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ReadAll%2A>

trans-unit.source: The format of the file is XML containing an serialized version of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoveryClientResultsFile> class.
trans-unit.target: O formato do ficheiro é XML que contém uma versão serializada de <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoveryClientResultsFile>classe.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoveryClientResultsFile>

trans-unit.source: If a file exists with the same name as the `topLevelFilename` parameter in the `directory` parameter, that file is overwritten by the WriteAll method.
trans-unit.target: Se existir um ficheiro com o mesmo nome que o `topLevelFilename` parâmetro o `directory` parâmetro, se o ficheiro será substituído pelo método WriteAll.

trans-unit.source: The `topLevelFilename` parameter must include the fully qualified path if the file does not exist in the current directory.
trans-unit.target: O `topLevelFilename` parâmetro tem de incluir o caminho completamente qualificado se o ficheiro não existir no diretório atual.

trans-unit.source: The directory in which to save all documents currently in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents*> property.
trans-unit.target: O diretório no qual guardou a todos os documentos atualmente no <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents*>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents*>

trans-unit.source: The name of the file to create or overwrite containing a map of all documents saved.
trans-unit.target: O nome do ficheiro para criar ou substituir que contém um mapa de todos os documentos guardado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientResultCollection"></xref> containing the results of all files saved.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientResultCollection"> </xref> que contém os resultados de todos os ficheiros guardados.
